name: Subpath - SSO methods
objective: Note: Archived MM-T983 as a duplicate of this one. Made sure to bring the traceability over here to preserve it from the other.

inline.description:
Subpath
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
On subpath server subpath.test.mattermost.com/mattermost
  1. Log in or create new account on subpath server using GitLab
  2. Log in to it using Android
  3. Log in to it using iOS 13+
inline.expectedResult: • All are able to log in using GitLab on the subpath server

inline.description:
Subpath
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
On subpath server subpath.test.mattermost.com/mattermost
  1. Log in or create new account on subpath server using OneLogin
  2. Log in to it using Android
  3. Log in to it using iOS 13+
inline.expectedResult: • All are able to log in using OneLogin on the subpath server

inline.description:
Subpath
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
On subpath server subpath.test.mattermost.com/mattermost
  1. Log in or create new account on subpath server using LDAP
  2. Log in to it using Android
  3. Log in to it using iOS (12 or 13+ is fine)
inline.expectedResult: • All are able to log in using LDAP on the subpath server

inline.description:
On the other subpath server https://subpath.test.mattermost.com/mattermost2
1. Log in or create new account on webapp using Office 365
2. Log in using Android
3. Log in using iOS (12 or 13+ is fine)
inline.expectedResult: ​​​​All are able to log in using Office 365 on the subpath server

inline.description:
On the other subpath server https://subpath.test.mattermost.com/mattermost2
1. Log in or create new account on webapp using OKTA
2. Log in using Android
3. Log in using iOS (12 or 13+ is fine)
inline.expectedResult: All are able to log in using OKTA on the subpath server
